overview:
Emily is currently the Director of Marketing for HomeSphere, Inc., managing their residential replacement and repair platform, BestContractors.com. Emily began her career with Video Professor, a Lakewood, Colorado based computer learning and direct marketing company. As the Alliances Marketing Manager for Virtuas Open Source Solutions, Emily managed partnerships with major corporations such as IBM, HP, Novell, Covalent, and TerraCotta. She later accepted the position of Marketing Director at Three Value Logic Sales Institute where she built a marketing infrastructure from the ground up. Over the years, Emily has facilitated consistent success using strategic development and tactical implementation to create from-scratch marketing plans that build businesses and brands.

Emily graduated Cum Laude from Colorado State University with a degree in Marketing and Speech Communication. A Colorado native, Emily enjoys traveling, hiking, and spending time with her family.
